name: quizzer
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who takes part in quizzes (= games in which you answer questions): I've been an avid quizzer for years. They were soon chased out of the pub by quizzers hunting spare stools.
More examplesFewer examples"Who Wants to Be A Millonaire" was the big target for serious quizzers.The documentary enters the world of professional quizzers and follows the UK's finest to the European Championships in Paris.Mark now plays pub quizzes three or four times a week and is a regular on the serious quizzers circuit.
